how to change the profile appearance of terminal:

go here and download whatever theme you like the most:

https://github.com/Mayccoll/Gogh


and set your default in edit -> preferences.

basically amounts to the shell command:
bash -c  "$(wget -qO- https://git.io/vQgMr)"

The profiles you like are:
03 05 15 23  32  35 42 48 50 54 56 58 62 61 69  88 106 137 147 151 153 155 168
